Room.Name: Marina Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Marina Way, admiring the magnificent Nylandian Bay.
Room.LongDescription: Marina Way runs along the coastline of the Nylandian Bay, so you can see all the various ships and cargo entering and leaving the bay. The crystal clear waters seem unpolluted from the massive industrial buildup which has made Oceancrest the town that it is. On the east is the Lelion Public Works station, responsible for the upkeep of the Lelion Beach and Park.
